#summary A collection of tools to work with mzTab.

= Introduction =

To make the use of mzTab easier for end-users as well as developers we created this collection of _tools_.

----

= mztab-exporter =

The *mztab-exporter* is a small program written in Java that allows exporting different file formats to mzTab. The *mztab-exporter* contains an easy-to-use Command Line Interface (CLI) but can also be used as a Java library. More information can be found [MzTabExporter here].

----
